name: SaverTato (Ludum Dare 46 Title)
description:
Saver Spudfill from evil weeds in SaverTato! Replenish his hunger with the red food button, and his thirst with the blue button while stopping the weeds from touching him. But fret not! There is a weedkiller barrier protecting him for now, so be careful! It will eventually disappear by being touched by a weed or when you get past 800 score.

Controls:

Use mouse to kill enemies by clicking on them, and click on the red and blue buttons to feed and give water to Spudfill the Potatomoid. Keep him alive!

Developer's note:

This was a quickly built game, as I had no idea Ludum Dare was taking place. When I found out it was I decided to participate because I have never done it before, so it is a great opportunity! Thank you for your time and I hope you have fun playing! Remember to report bugs below if there are any, and also your feedback so I can see how the game went. 

-Caleb (LebbyFoxx)

SaverTato, a game by Caleb Phillips/LebbyFoxx, made in 2020.
